Detailed Description

DEI FMD configuration.

struct Vps_DeiFmdConfig

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::bed

Enable Bad edit detection.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::caf

Detected combing artifacts. Read only parameter.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::cafFieldThr

CAF threshold used for the pixels from two fields. This is the threshold used for combing artifacts detection. The difference of two consecutive lines (when merging two fields into one progressive frame) is used to compare with this threshold. Increasing this threshold leads to be more conservative in detecting CAF.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::cafLineThr

CAF threshold used for the pixels from two lines in one field. This is the threshold used for combing artifacts detection. The difference of two consecutive lines from the same field (so there is one line in between if two fields are merged into one progressive frame) is compared with this threshold. Decreasing this threshold leads to be more conservative in detecting CAF. Both fmd_caf_field_thr and fmd_caf_line_thr are close the values that two pixels differed by this value is observable.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::cafThr

CAF threshold used for leaving film mode: If the combing artifacts is greater than this threshold, CAF is detected and thus the state machine will be forced to leave the film mode. If the user prefers to be more conservative in using film mode, decrease this threshold.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::chNum

Channel number for which the configuration is to be set/get. Used only in M2M driver, for display and capture driver set this to 0.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::filmMode

Enable Film mode.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::fldDiff

Field difference (difference between two neighboring fields, one top and one bottom). Read only parameter.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::frameDiff

Frame difference (difference between two top or two bottom fields). Read only parameter.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::jamDir

Field jamming direction. For valid values see Vps_DeiFmdJamDir.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::lock

Lock Deinterlacer to film mode.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::reset

When 1, the film mode detection module needs to be reset by the software. This bit needs to be checked at each occurrence of the film mode detection interrupt. Read only parameter.

UInt32 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::window

Enable FMD operation window.

UInt16 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::windowMaxx

Right boundary of FMD window

UInt16 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::windowMaxy

Bottom boundary of FMD window

UInt16 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::windowMinx

Left boundary of FMD window

UInt16 Vps_DeiFmdConfig::windowMiny

Top boundary of FMD window
